content: **crocheted and felted coaster in drops lima the piece is worked in the round from the middle outwards with bobbles theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #merrykitchenhotpad drops design pattern li-194 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** after felting approx 15 cm in diameter before felting approx 18 cm in diameter **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 3609 red **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm when you have worked 2 row of bobbles the piece measures approx 4 cm in diameter
